forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this morning will mix with rain at times this afternoon. High 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow this afternoon. High near 40F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this evening will mix with rain at times late. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this evening will mix with rain at times late. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 36F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 43F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will change to a mixture of wintry precipitation later at night. Low -1C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening. Then a wintry mix overnight. Low near 30F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low around 35F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 35F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
